nodes.text: Max was a male Twi'lek who fought for the Twi'lek Resistance during the Battle of Ryloth. During the initial stages of the Confederacy of Independent Systems' invasion of Ryloth, Max was one of the many Twi'leks who were massacred by Separatist forces. He was buried in a grave, marked with his name in Aurebesh, on Ryloth.
